function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of private cars due to safety concerns about public transport","Impact":"Higher traffic congestion and pollution due to increased private car usage","Mitigation":"Improving safety measures and communication to alleviate anxiety about using public transport","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, contactless payment, and real-time occupancy data","People":"Road users, public transport passengers","Owner":"Public transport operators, authorities"},{"Description":"Dramatic reduction in demand for public transport","Impact":"Loss of revenue and financial difficulties for public transport operators","Mitigation":"Financial support from authorities, improving safety measures to increase public trust","Technologies":"Contactless payment, real-time occupancy data","People":"Public transport operators, authorities","Owner":"Authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of contagion in public transport impacting lower-income workers","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and limited access to safe transport for lower-income workers","Mitigation":"Maintain frequency and capacity to enable social distancing, provide financial support to public transport operators","Technologies":"Real-time occupancy data, improved ventilation systems","People":"Lower-income workers, public transport operators","Owner":"Public transport operators, authorities"}]}
